articles.title: At Least Ten Killed in 'Racially Motivated' Mass Shooting at US Grocery Store in New York - News18
articles.description: Buffalo Police Commissioner put the toll at 10 dead and three wounded. Eleven of the victims were African Americans
articles.content:
A heavily armed 18-year-old man shot 10 people dead on Saturday at a Buffalo, New York grocery store in a “racially motivated" attack that he live-streamed on camera, authorities said.
